description: Mutinous numbers: n>1 such that n/p^k > p, where p is the largest prime dividing n and p^k is the highest power of p dividing n.
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = {my(f = factor(n)); my(maxf = #f~); my(p = f[maxf, 1]); my(pk = f[maxf, 2]); (n/p^pk) > p;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 16 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_.
extensions: Offset changed to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, Jan 16 2014
